trans-unit.source: Archangel's Light
trans-unit.target: 大天使恩光

trans-unit.resname: DKA·1 | Archangel's Light | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You gain 2 life for each card in your graveyard, then shuffle your graveyard into your library.
trans-unit.target: 你的坟墓场每有一张牌便获得2点生命，然后将你的坟墓场洗入你的牌库中。

trans-unit.source: "This is the light of Avacyn. Even in her absence she offers us hope."\n—Radulf, priest of Avacyn
trans-unit.target: 「这是艾维欣的光芒。即使她不在此处，也替我们带来希望。」～艾维欣僧侣拉多夫

trans-unit.resname: DKA·2 | Bar the Door | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bar the Door
trans-unit.target: 闩住大门

trans-unit.resname: DKA·2 | Bar the Door | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +0/+4 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物得+0/+4直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: DKA·2 | Bar the Door | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It may not look like much, but it's a good old door with strong wards. It'll hold."\n—Olgard of the Skiltfolk
trans-unit.target: 「这门看来虽不起眼，但的确带着实实在在的守护。它能挡得住。」～技卫士欧贾得

trans-unit.resname: DKA·3 | Break of Day | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Break of Day
trans-unit.target: 曙光乍现

trans-unit.resname: DKA·3 | Break of Day | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.\nFateful hour — If you have 5 or less life, those creatures also are indestructible this turn. (Lethal damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。 命悬一刻～如果你的生命为5或更少，这些生物本回合也不会毁坏。（致命伤害以及注明「消灭」的效应都不会将它们消灭。）

trans-unit.resname: DKA·4 | Burden of Guilt | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Burden of Guilt
trans-unit.target: 内疚拖累

trans-unit.resname: DKA·4 | Burden of Guilt | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\n{1}: Tap enchanted creature.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 {1}：横置所结附的生物。

trans-unit.resname: DKA·4 | Burden of Guilt | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Grab an axe and defend the gate! Your despair is an extravagance we can ill afford."\n—Thalia, Knight-Cathar
trans-unit.target: 「抓起斧头来防卫城门！我们可负担不起你的丧气。」～护教军骑士莎利雅

trans-unit.resname: DKA·5 | Curse of Exhaustion | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Curse of Exhaustion
trans-unit.target: 疲竭诅咒

trans-unit.resname: DKA·5 | Curse of Exhaustion | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant player\nEnchanted player can't cast more than one spell each turn.
trans-unit.target: 所结附的牌手每回合不能施放一个以上的咒语。

trans-unit.resname: DKA·5 | Curse of Exhaustion | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I do believe your heresy will prove more difficult now that you have more pressing concerns."\n—Bishop Argust
trans-unit.target: 「既然你有了更多顾忌，我确信你的异端邪说将更窒碍难行。」～主教亚固斯

trans-unit.source: Elgaud Inquisitor
trans-unit.target: 艾尔告审判官

trans-unit.resname: DKA·6 | Elgaud Inquisitor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)\nWhen CARDNAME dies, put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 系命（此生物所造成的伤害会让你获得等量的生命。）当CARDNAME死去时，将一个1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物放进战场。

trans-unit.source: "It will take more than steel alone to purge this world of evil."
trans-unit.target: 「要涤净这邪恶世界，光靠钢铁是不够的。」

trans-unit.source: Faith's Shield
trans-unit.target: 信念护盾

trans-unit.resname: DKA·7 | Faith's Shield | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target permanent you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.\nFateful hour — If you have 5 or less life, instead you and each permanent you control gain protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 选择一种颜色，目标由你操控的永久物获得反该色保护异能直到回合结束。命悬一刻～如果你的生命为5或更少，则改为选择一种颜色，你与每个由你操控的永久物获得反该色保护异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: DKA·8 | Gather the Townsfolk | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gather the Townsfolk
trans-unit.target: 集合镇民

trans-unit.resname: DKA·8 | Gather the Townsfolk | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Put two 1/1 white Human creature tokens onto the battlefield.\nFateful hour — If you have 5 or less life, put five of those tokens onto the battlefield instead.
trans-unit.target: 将两个1/1白色人类衍生生物放进战场。命悬一刻～如果你的生命为5或更少，则改为将五个上述的衍生物放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: DKA·8 | Gather the Townsfolk | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In the memories of those they lost lies the strength needed to defend their city.
trans-unit.target: 对逝去事物的追忆化为他们守护市镇所需的力量。

trans-unit.source: Gavony Ironwright
trans-unit.target: 加渥尼修铁匠

trans-unit.resname: DKA·9 | Gavony Ironwright | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Fateful hour — As long as you have 5 or less life, other creatures you control get +1/+4.
trans-unit.target: 命悬一刻～只要你的生命为5或更少，由你操控的其他生物得+1/+4。

trans-unit.source: "I wish my work could shelter everyone, yet I pray we are never so few that it does."
trans-unit.target: 「我希望自己的心血足以庇护众人，更祈祷吾众数量能超我负荷。」

trans-unit.source: Hollowhenge Spirit
trans-unit.target: 空圆地精怪

trans-unit.resname: DKA·10 | Hollowhenge Spirit | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)\nFlying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, remove target attacking or blocking creature from combat.
trans-unit.target: 闪现（你可以于你能够施放瞬间的时机下施放此咒语。）当CARDNAME进战场时，将目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物移出战斗。

trans-unit.source: Some spirits mourn. Others terrorize.
trans-unit.target: 有些灵魂满怀哀痛。其他的则令人胆寒。

trans-unit.source: Increasing Devotion
trans-unit.target: 奉献渐增

trans-unit.resname: DKA·11 | Increasing Devotion | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Put five 1/1 white Human creature tokens onto the battlefield. If CARDNAME was cast from a graveyard, put ten of those tokens onto the battlefield instead.\nFlashback {7}{W}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 将五个1/1白色人类衍生生物放进战场。如果CARDNAME是从坟墓场施放，则改为将十个这类衍生物放进战场。 返照{7}{W}{W} （你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.source: Lingering Souls
trans-unit.target: 徘徊灵魂

trans-unit.resname: DKA·12 | Lingering Souls | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Put two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.\nFlashback {1}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 将两个1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物放进战场。 返照{1}{B} （你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.source: The murdered inhabitants of Hollowhenge impart to the living the terror they felt in death.
trans-unit.target: 空圆地遇难者将自己死时的恐惧传给生者。

trans-unit.source: Loyal Cathar
trans-unit.target: 忠诚护教军

trans-unit.resname: DKA·13 | Loyal Cathar | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nWhen CARDNAME dies, return it to the battlefield transformed under your control at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去，在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它转化并在你的操控下返回战场。

trans-unit.source: "I trust myself to do my duty, even unto death. It's what comes after that I'm afraid of."\n—Constable Visil, to Thalia
trans-unit.target: 「我相信自己能尽忠职守，至死方休。我害怕的是那之后的事。」～保安官威锡致莎利雅

trans-unit.source: Unhallowed Cathar
trans-unit.target: 护教军孽物

trans-unit.resname: DKA·13 | Unhallowed Cathar | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't block.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能进行阻挡。

trans-unit.source: "Just fight without fear. Your soul is protected by the hand of Avacyn and will never submit to evil."\n—Thalia, to Constable Visil
trans-unit.target: 「请毫无疑惧地奋战下去。艾维欣之手将保护你的灵魂，绝不交付给邪恶。」～莎利雅致保安官威锡

trans-unit.source: Midnight Guard
trans-unit.target: 午夜哨兵

trans-unit.resname: DKA·14 | Midnight Guard | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, untap CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个生物进战场时，重置CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: "When you're on watch, no noise is harmless and no shadow can be ignored."\n—Olgard of the Skiltfolk
trans-unit.target: 「轮你值班的时候，不会有无害的噪音，也没有可以忽略的影子。」～技卫士欧贾得

trans-unit.resname: DKA·15 | Niblis of the Mist | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Niblis of the Mist
trans-unit.target: 雾气寒灵

trans-unit.resname: DKA·15 | Niblis of the Mist | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may tap target creature.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以横置目标生物。

trans-unit.resname: DKA·15 | Niblis of the Mist | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Not even a roaring fire could thaw the chill it put in my heart."\n—Vonn, geist-trapper
trans-unit.target: 「就连翻腾火焰也无法融解它吹进我心底的寒冷。」～捕游魂师逢恩

trans-unit.resname: DKA·16 | Niblis of the Urn | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Niblis of the Urn
trans-unit.target: 壶中寒灵

trans-unit.resname: DKA·16 | Niblis of the Urn | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, you may tap target creature.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以横置目标生物。

trans-unit.resname: DKA·16 | Niblis of the Urn | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I never had the nerve to open that bottle. I'll bet you're wishing right now you hadn't been so curious yourself."\n—Old Rutstein
trans-unit.target: 「我从不敢打开那瓶子。我打赌你现在正希望自己不该那么好奇。」～老鲁斯登

trans-unit.resname: DKA·17 | Ray of Revelation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ray of Revelation
trans-unit.target: 揭露之光

trans-unit.resname: DKA·17 | Ray of Revelation | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Destroy target enchantment.\nFlashback {G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标结界。 返照{G} （你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.resname: DKA·17 | Ray of Revelation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "May angels carry him into the Blessed Sleep with dreams of sunlit days and moonless nights."\n—Tomb inscription of Saint Raban
trans-unit.target: 「愿天使领他进入充满阳光普照、无月夜晚美梦的受福安眠。」～圣拉班的墓志铭

trans-unit.source: Requiem Angel
trans-unit.target: 安魂天使

trans-unit.resname: DKA·18 | Requiem Angel | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever another non-Spirit creature you control dies, put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个非精怪、且由你操控的生物死去时，将一个1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物放进战场。

trans-unit.source: When angels despair, what hope can remain for mortals?
trans-unit.target: 若天使都失志沮丧，生灵岂能作何指望？

trans-unit.source: Sanctuary Cat
trans-unit.target: 圣堂猫

trans-unit.source: Cats prowl the corridors of Avacyn's churches in search of devils or signs of their mischief.
trans-unit.target: 猫在艾维欣教会回廊梭巡，搜寻魔鬼或其胡闹的迹象。

trans-unit.source: Séance
trans-unit.target: 降灵

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each upkeep, you may exile target creature card from your graveyard. If you do, put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of that card except it's a Spirit in addition to its other types. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 在每个维持开始时，你可以从你的坟墓场放逐目标生物牌。若你如此作，将一个衍生物放进战场，且为该牌的复制品，并额外具有精怪此类别。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它放逐。

trans-unit.source: Silverclaw Griffin
trans-unit.target: 银爪狮鹫

trans-unit.resname: DKA·21 | Silverclaw Griffin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, first strike
trans-unit.target: 飞行，先攻

trans-unit.source: It patrols the grafs for miles around Thraben, ensuring that the unhallowed do not wake for long.
trans-unit.target: 他巡视瑟班境内的墓地，好确保孽物不会醒来太久。

trans-unit.source: Skillful Lunge
trans-unit.target: 老练刺击

trans-unit.resname: DKA·22 | Skillful Lunge | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+2/+0且获得先攻异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Valor is a currency of the living that serves us well."\n—Cosper Lowe of the Silbern Guard
trans-unit.target: 「勇气这生灵价值对我们很有用。」～席尔本卫队的考伯洛

trans-unit.source: Sudden Disappearance
trans-unit.target: 突然消失

trans-unit.resname: DKA·23 | Sudden Disappearance | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile all nonland permanents target player controls. Return the exiled cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标牌手操控的所有非地永久物。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将所有以此法放逐的牌各在其拥有者之操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: DKA·24 | Thalia, Guardian of Thraben | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Thalia, Guardian of Thraben
trans-unit.target: 瑟班守护者莎利雅

trans-unit.source: First strike\nNoncreature spells cost {1} more to cast.
trans-unit.target: 非生物咒语增加{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: DKA·24 | Thalia, Guardian of Thraben | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Thraben is our home and I will not see it fall to this unhallowed horde."
trans-unit.target: 「瑟班是我们的家乡，我不会让它落入孽物大军手中。」

trans-unit.source: Thraben Doomsayer
trans-unit.target: 瑟班劫难论者

trans-unit.resname: DKA·25 | Thraben Doomsayer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Put a 1/1 white Human creature token onto the battlefield.\nFateful hour — As long as you have 5 or less life, other creatures you control get +2/+2.
trans-unit.target: {T}：将一个1/1白色人类衍生生物放进战场。命悬一刻～只要你的生命为5或更少，由你操控的其他生物得+2/+2。

trans-unit.source: "Swarms of the unhallowed claw at Thraben's gates! Do you still deny the end approaches?"
trans-unit.target: 「孽物大群的魔掌已袭向瑟班城门！你们还想否认末日将临吗？」

trans-unit.source: Thraben Heretic
trans-unit.target: 瑟班异教徒

trans-unit.resname: DKA·26 | Thraben Heretic | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard.
trans-unit.target: {T}：将目标生物牌从坟墓场放逐。

trans-unit.source: "Let them decry me for burning the dead. I'm not giving those ghoulcallers any more fuel for their madness."
trans-unit.target: 「我不介意焚烧亡者而招人责难。我不想替那些尸鬼牧者增添狂行助力。」

trans-unit.source: Artful Dodge
trans-unit.target: 精巧闪躲

trans-unit.resname: DKA·27 | Artful Dodge | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target creature is unblockable this turn.\nFlashback {U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 目标生物本回合中不能被阻挡。 返照{U} （你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.source: Those who know the alleys and sewers of the Erdwal can disappear like smoke.
trans-unit.target: 熟知尔卓道的小巷与下水道者，能够如烟雾般消失。

trans-unit.resname: DKA·28 | Beguiler of Wills | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Beguiler of Wills
trans-unit.target: 惑志师

trans-unit.resname: DKA·28 | Beguiler of Wills | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Gain control of target creature with power less than or equal to the number of creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: {T}：获得目标生物的操控权，且其力量需等于或小于由你操控的生物数量。

trans-unit.resname: DKA·28 | Beguiler of Wills | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Come, let me free you of the tyranny of thought."
trans-unit.target: 「来吧，让我将你从思想的宰制中解放。」

trans-unit.resname: DKA·29 | Bone to Ash | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bone to Ash
trans-unit.target: 白骨化灰

trans-unit.resname: DKA·29 | Bone to Ash | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Counter target creature spell.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标生物咒语。抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: DKA·29 | Bone to Ash | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I can think of worse ways to go. On second thought, maybe not."\n—Ludevic, necro-alchemist
trans-unit.target: 「我能想到更糟的告别法。不过仔细想想，那也许还算不上。」～死灵炼金术士卢德维

trans-unit.resname: DKA·30 | Call to the Kindred | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Call to the Kindred
trans-unit.target: 呼唤同族

trans-unit.resname: DKA·30 | Call to the Kindred | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top five cards of your library. If you do, you may put a creature card that shares a creature type with enchanted creature from among them onto the battlefield, then you put the rest of those cards on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，你可以检视你牌库顶的五张牌。若你如此作，你可以将其中一张生物牌放进战场，且它必须与所结附的生物有共通之生物类别，然后将其余的牌以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: DKA·31 | Chant of the Skifsang | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chant of the Skifsang
trans-unit.target: 航歌员吟诵

trans-unit.resname: DKA·31 | Chant of the Skifsang | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets -13/-0.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 所结附的生物得-13/-0。

trans-unit.resname: DKA·31 | Chant of the Skifsang | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The skifsang, seafarers of Nephalia, craft spells like other sailors craft nets—making them strong enough to snare even the deadliest catch.
trans-unit.target: 涅非利亚有批称为航歌员的水手，能如同其他水手织出强韧网一般地造出咒语，足以困住最可怕的获物。

trans-unit.resname: DKA·32 | Chill of Foreboding | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chill of Foreboding
trans-unit.target: 不寒而栗

trans-unit.resname: DKA·32 | Chill of Foreboding | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Each player puts the top five cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.\nFlashback {7}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手各将其牌库顶的五张牌置入其坟墓场。 返照{7}{U} （你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.resname: DKA·32 | Chill of Foreboding | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Wait . . . did you fellows hear something?"
trans-unit.target: 「等等...各位伙伴有没有听到什么？」

trans-unit.source: Counterlash
trans-unit.target: 反打

trans-unit.source: Counter target spell. You may cast a nonland card in your hand that shares a card type with that spell without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。你可以从你手上施放一张与该咒语有共通牌类别的非地牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.source: "Pathetic. Let me show you how it's done."
trans-unit.target: 「真没用。瞧瞧我是怎么作的。」

trans-unit.resname: DKA·34 | Curse of Echoes | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Curse of Echoes
trans-unit.target: 回响诅咒

trans-unit.resname: DKA·34 | Curse of Echoes | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant player\nWhenever enchanted player casts an instant or sorcery spell, each other player may copy that spell and may choose new targets for the copy he or she controls.

trans-unit.resname: DKA·133 | Wolfbitten Captive | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {1}{G}: CARDNAME gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.\nAt the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: {1}{G}：CARDNAME得+2/+2直到回合结束。此异能每回合中只能起动一次。在每个维持开始时，若上回合没有任一咒语施放过，转化CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Krallenhorde Killer
trans-unit.target: 展爪杀手

trans-unit.resname: DKA·133 | Krallenhorde Killer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {3}{G}: CARDNAME gets +4/+4 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.\nAt the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: {3}{G}：CARDNAME得+4/+4直到回合结束。此异能每回合中只能起动一次。在每个维持开始时，若某牌手上回合施放了两个或更多咒语，转化CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Young Wolf
trans-unit.target: 幼狼

trans-unit.resname: DKA·134 | Young Wolf | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: 不息（当此生物死去时，若其上没有+1/+1指示物，则将它在其拥有者的操控下返回战场，且其上有一个+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.source: The Ulvenwald makes no allowances for youth. Today's newborn is either tomorrow's hunter or tomorrow's lunch.
trans-unit.target: 沃文森没有幼小者容身之地。今日的新生儿若非明日的猎人，就是明日的午餐。

trans-unit.source: Diregraf Captain
trans-unit.target: 战墓队长

trans-unit.resname: DKA·135 | Diregraf Captain | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch\nOther Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1.\nWhenever another Zombie you control dies, target opponent loses 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其他灵俑生物得+1/+1。每当由你操控的另一个灵俑死去时，目标对手失去1点生命。

trans-unit.source: Though its mind has long since rotted away, it wields a sword with deadly skill.
trans-unit.target: 虽然其心智早已腐烂消失，它使剑功夫依旧致命。

trans-unit.source: Drogskol Captain
trans-unit.target: 卓兹克队长

trans-unit.source: Flying\nOther Spirit creatures you control get +1/+1 and have hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 由你操控的其他精怪生物得+1/+1并具有辟邪异能。（它们不能成为由对手所操控之咒语或异能的目标。）

trans-unit.source: Dead or alive, true leaders can inspire an entire army.
trans-unit.target: 不论死活，真正的领导者都能激励整个部队。

trans-unit.source: Drogskol Reaver
trans-unit.target: 卓兹克裂肢灵

trans-unit.source: Flying, double strike, lifelink\nWhenever you gain life, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 飞行，连击，系命 每当你获得生命时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Wracked and warped with anguish, it obsessively seeks out other souls to hoard within its eternal prison.
trans-unit.target: 它被极度痛苦所充盈而扭曲，亟欲将其他灵魂囚入自己的永恒牢笼。

trans-unit.source: Falkenrath Aristocrat

trans-unit.source: Flying, haste\nSacrifice a creature: CARDNAME is indestructible this turn. If the sacrificed creature was a Human, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物：伐肯纳贵族本回合不会毁坏。如果牺牲的生物是人类，在伐肯纳贵族上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: "Your blood is quite pleasing. A pity there's not enough for both of us."
trans-unit.target: 「你的血相当令我满意。只可惜份量不够我俩共享。」

trans-unit.source: Havengul Lich

trans-unit.target: {1}：你本回合可以从任一坟墓场施放目标生物牌。当你本回合施放该牌时，CARDNAME获得该牌的所有起动式异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Fusing intelligence with the power of undeath requires inspiration of the darkest kind.
trans-unit.target: 以不死生物的力量滋养智慧，需要来自最黑暗物种的灵感。

trans-unit.source: Whenever this creature enters the battlefield or transforms into CARDNAME, put a 2/2 green Wolf creature token onto the battlefield and you gain 2 life.\nAt the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当此生物进战场或转化为CARDNAME时，将一个2/2绿色狼衍生生物放进战场，且你获得2点生命。在每个维持开始时，若上回合没有任一咒语施放过，转化CARDNAME。
